comments.content: Looks like [Acta Poster Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419024625/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/dstype/acta_poster_italic_ot/ot_ps?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=85&sample_text=food%20hub&ft=liga) by Dino dos Santos to me.
Looks like a close match. Thanks!
